basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around
basic.color: Flower color white, leaf color emerald green

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
